title: Smart Data models - ietf-inet-types schema
description: This module contains a collection of generally useful derived YANG data types for Internet addresses and related things. This version of this YANG module is part of RFC 6991; see the RFC itself for full legal notices.

ip_version.description: This value represents the version of the IP protocol. In the value set and its semantics, this type is equivalent to the InetVersion textual convention of the SMIv2.
